column1: #: description: Scaling behaviour as a function $\sqrt{s_{_{\mathrm{NN}}}}$ of the width of the charged-particle or -pion rapidity-density distribution with respect to the Landau-Carruthers width (top) and rapidity range (bottom).  Charged-pion points from AGS and SPS are adapted from the literature [PRL94.162301]
column3: 052303] and BRAHMS (open crosses) [PRL88.202301] charged-hadron points are translated from the corresponding $\mathrm{d}N_{\mathrm{ch}}/\mathrm{d}\eta$ results.

column1: #: keyword reactions: A A --> CHARGED X
